problems.title: Reverse Number
problems.description:
Write a program to enter a number and print its reverse.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
A single integer representing the reversed number.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
123

Sample Output
321

Explanation:
Reverse of 123 is 321.
hintsList: Multiply reverse by 10 and add the last digit of n.
